name: Wouter Josemans
bio:
Wouter Josemans is a senior AI programmer at Guerrilla Games. He graduated from the University of Amsterdam in 2012, holding an MSc in Artificial Intelligence. After graduating, he started
working at Guerrilla on the various AI systems of Killzone: Shadow Fall and later Horizon Zero Dawn, where he focused mainly on combat behavior and aerial navigation. He's currently working
on the Frozen Wilds expansion for Horizon Zero Dawn.
